snippet: Saudi Arabia’s human rights record came under scrutiny again this week after seven men were publicly executed and a court sentenced two prominent civil rights activists to jail.
abstract: Saudi Arabia’s human rights record came under scrutiny again this week after seven men were publicly executed and a court sentenced two prominent civil rights activists to jail.

headline.main: Saudi Human Rights Record Comes Under New Scrutiny

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
